
================
xhostplus.social
================

This product adds social network buttons to each page. It supports Google+,
Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn. It is configurable which services are
activated.

xhostplus.social comes with optional support for jquery.socialshareprivacy,
developed and distributed by Heise Zeitschriften Verlag GmbH & Co. KG.

Translations
============

This product comes with following languages:

* English
* German

Further translations are welcome.

- Questions and comments to support@xhostplus.at
